mapper.select: select * from RoleSystemResource where RowId=#{RowId} AND TenantRowId=#{TenantRowId}
mapper.update:
update RoleSystemResource set
RowId=#{RowId}, RoleRowId=#{RoleRowId}, SystemResourceRowId=#{SystemResourceRowId}, CreateDate=#{CreateDate}, Creater=#{Creater} where RowId=#{RowId} AND TenantRowId=#{TenantRowId}
mapper.delete: delete from RoleSystemResource where RowId=#{RowId} AND TenantRowId=#{TenantRowId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RoleSystemResource (
RowId, RoleRowId, SystemResourceRowId, CreateDate, Creater, TenantRowId ) VALUES( #{RowId}, #{RoleRowId}, #{SystemResourceRowId}, #{CreateDate}, #{Creater}, #{TenantRowId} )
